examples: The people believed the girl was possessed by demons.
La gente creía que la niña estaba poseída por demonios.
She's had to battle her personal demons throughout her adult life.
Ha tenido que luchar contra sus demonios personales a lo largo de su vida adulta.
He is plagued by demons which go back to his traumatic childhood.
Está plagado de demonios que se remontan a su traumática infancia.
